description: We provide a wide selection of  luxury as well as budgeted villas in Lonavala for rent. Our catalogue includes the most suitable Lonavala villas on rent. Lonavala is one of the most beautiful retreats, that takes you away from the maddening rush of the metropolises. Popularly called the “city of caves’ ‘ and the “Jewel of Sahyadri” this hill station boasts of some of the most spectacular settings that include luxuriant green valleys, remarkable caves, serene lakes and stunning waterfalls.
name: Lonavala
